[Build].description: Changing someting that affect the build system or external dependencies (example scopes: gulp, broccoli, npm)

[Chore].description: Other changes that don't modify src or test files

[CI].description: Fixing or adding CI build system

[Docs].description: Updating docs or documenting source code

[Ship].description: Deploying a new release or hotfix

[Struc].description: Updating file architecture, structure or format of the code

[Style].description: Changing something that do not affect the meaning of the code (white-space, formatting, missing semi-colons, etc)

[UI].description: Updating the UI or styles file
